sentences.english: I was surrounded by sky-blue silk and polished lacquer .
sentences.chinese: 我被天藍色的綢子和光亮的漆器包圍着。

sentences.english: Fujian lacquerware is known far and wide.
Chinese lacquerware has a very long history but when did it first come into existence ?
sentences.chinese: 中國漆器歷史悠久，它是什麼時候開始出現的？

sentences.english: A curious deposit all over my snuff-box, evidently residue of moisture acting on lacquer.
sentences.chinese: 我的漆器鼻菸盒上也籠罩着一層水汽。

sentences.english: Lacquerware art is a traditional artistic culture older than Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 漆器藝術是一門比漢字更爲古老的傳統藝術文化。

sentences.english: Radiating a serene luster, lacquer ware is an exquisite Chinese craft.
sentences.chinese: 輻射寧靜的光澤，漆器是一個精美的中國工藝。

sentences.english: This work enables readers to appreciate the correct text of the classic work on artisanship, Xiushi lu.
sentences.chinese: 以使讀者準確認識漆器工藝經典著作《髹飾錄》。

sentences.english: I was surrounded by sky-blue silk and polished lacquer.
sentences.chinese: 我被天藍色的綢子和光亮的漆器包圍著。

sentences.english: Lacquering silver and copper specimens after cleaning will keep them bright for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 漆器銀和銅標本清洗後，將讓他們展現了很長的時間。

sentences.english: The Palace Museum has Chinas richest collection of Ming dynasty lacquer wares.
sentences.chinese: 庋藏於故宮博物院的明代漆器是國內收藏之最。

sentences.english: Paper cuttings used to the used as patterns, especially for embroidery and lacquer works.
sentences.chinese: 剪紙曾被用來做花樣，尤其是用於刺繡和漆器品。

sentences.english: Well, what's special about bodiless lacquerware?
sentences.chinese: 脫胎漆器有什麼特別嗎？

sentences.english: Traditional painting also is done in albums and on walls, lacquerwork, and other media.
sentences.chinese: 傳統繪畫也做了相冊及在牆上，漆器，和其他媒體。

sentences.english: Yes , to meet popular needs , Fujian lacquerwork has.
sentences.chinese: 是的，爲滿足大衆的需要，福建漆器的。

sentences.english: Besides bodiless lacquerware, we also deal in wooden-bodied lacquerware, madam.
sentences.chinese: 除了脫胎漆器，我們還經營木胎漆器，夫人。

sentences.english: Besides bodiless lacquerware, we also deal in wooden-bodied lacquerware, madam.
sentences.chinese: 除了脫胎漆器，我們還經營木胎漆器，夫人。

definition: item made from woven silk or rayon
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
black eggshell pottery (of the Neolithic Longshan culture)
